yarn needle page 2 barbie halter dress copyright emi harrington instructions worked flat top down 1 chain 11 single_crochet in the 2nd stitch from the hook and each stitch of the chain 2 *chain 1 and turn single_crochet in each stitch across the row repeat from * for 5 more row 3 chain 11 turn slip_stitch across the row to the end of the halter then chain 12 turn double_crochet in the 3rd stitch from the hook and each stitch across the row 4 chain 3 and turn double_crochet in the same stitch v stitch formed *skip the next stitch v_stitch in the next stitch v_stitch = double_crochet ch1 double_crochet repeat from * across the row 5 *chain 2 and turn in every chain 1 space make a v_stitch repeat from * for 5 more row or as many as desired fold the work in half and slip_stitch the back seam of the dress fasten_off weave yarn ends into the finished work chain cords on each side of the halter top i chained 20 each cord page3 barbiehalter dress copyright emiharrington more barbie
